description: Complete system overview focusing on the insurance quote generation platform, core components, and high-level architecture
Detailed documentation of insurance-specific data models including quote structures, commission hierarchies, organization relationships, and contract models
Technical details of premium calculation algorithms, health class determination, rate adjustments, and quote aggregation logic across carriers
Documentation of commission distribution algorithms, hierarchical splits, and organization-based commission calculations
Detailed documentation of carrier integration patterns, quote normalization processes, and provider-specific data transformations
